info.name: E-Commerce API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for E-Commerce Laravel application with Sanctum authentication.

**Base URL:** http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1

**Authentication:** Bearer Token (Sanctum)

**Features:**
- User Authentication (Register, Login, Logout, Update, Delete)
- Products Management (Owner only) - 6 endpoints
- Admin Products (Admin role only) - 6 endpoints
- Categories Management (Owner only) - 6 endpoints
- Orders Management (Create, View, Update, Cancel, Delete) - 6 endpoints

**Role IDs:**
- Owner: 1 (Manages main catalog & categories)
- Admin: 2 (Manages own products)
- Customer: 3 (Can place orders)

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Required Fields:**
- name
- email (unique)
- phone (10-20 chars, unique)
- password
- password_confirmation

**Optional:**
- image_path (file, max 2MB)
- role_id (Owner only)

Authenticate user and receive Bearer token.

**Rate Limit:** 10 attempts per 5 minutes

**Required:**
- email
- password

Update authenticated user's profile.

**All fields optional** - send only what needs to be updated.

**Note:** If updating password, password_confirmation is required.
Revoke current authentication token.

Permanently delete the authenticated user's account.

⚠️ **Warning:** This action cannot be undone.

item.description: User authentication and profile management endpoints.

request.description:
Retrieve all products with optional filters and sorting.

**Query Parameters (all optional):**
- search
- category_id
- min_price / max_price
- is_active
- sort_by / sort_direction

Retrieve a single product by ID.

**Auth:** Required

**Returns:** Product details with category information

Create a new product in main catalog.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

**Required:**
- name
- description
- price
- stock

Update existing product.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

**All fields optional** - send only what needs updating.

Delete a single product.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

Delete all products from main catalog.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

⚠️ **Warning:** This deletes ALL products!

Get admin's own products.

**Permission:** Admin only (role_id = 2)

**Note:** Shows only products created by the authenticated admin.

Retrieve a single admin product by ID.

**Permission:** Admin only (role_id = 2)

**Note:** Can only view own products

Create a new admin product.

**Permission:** Admin only (role_id = 2)

**Required:**
- name
- price

Update admin product.

**Permission:** Admin only (can only update own products)

**All fields optional**

Delete admin product.

**Permission:** Admin only (can only delete own products)

Delete all admin's own products.

**Permission:** Admin only

⚠️ **Note:** Deletes only the authenticated admin's products.

Retrieve all categories.

**Query Parameters:**
- search (optional)

Retrieve a single category by ID.

**Auth:** Required

**Returns:** Category details

Create a new category.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

**Required:**
- name (unique)

**Optional:**
- description
- is_active (default 1)

Update existing category.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

**All fields optional**

Delete a category.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

Delete all categories.

**Permission:** Owner only (role_id = 1)

⚠️ **Warning:** This deletes ALL categories!

Get orders list.

**Permissions:**
- Regular users: see only own orders
- Super Admin: see all orders

Create a new order.

**Required:**
- product_id (must exist)
- quantity (min 1)

**Optional:**
- notes

**Automatic:**
- Generates order_number
- Calculates total_amount
- Decreases product stock
- Creates order_item

Get order details.

**Permissions:**
- Order owner can view
- Super Admin can view any

Update order status.

**Permission:** Super Admin only

**Optional Fields:**
- status (pending|processing|completed|cancelled)
- notes

Delete an order.

**Permission:** Super Admin only
